channel.title: Easy question, want free rep++?
channel.description: how can i fix this? you can wield d bolts while using a magic bow, hitting 800s with spec, or constant 300-400s

item.title: Easy question, want free rep++?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Brandontan, post:3, topic:433359”]could you give me an example?
i thought there was an array somewhere with a list of item ids that declares it as a bolt and the same thing for an arrow. so if i could just delete the int for d bolt thats in the arrow array list[/quote]

There is, in player.java search:

public static final int[] Bolts	=

Above this is also arrows.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy question, want free rep++?

item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

make an if statement that doesn’t allow BOLTS to be used. BOLTS is located in Player.java.
